TITLE: Installing Doorkeeper Gem via Bundler
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to add the Doorkeeper gem to your application's Gemfile. This is the first step in integrating Doorkeeper OAuth 2 provider functionality into a Ruby application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
gem 'doorkeeper'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Reusing Access Tokens with Doorkeeper (Ruby)
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing how to find matching tokens in batches for the `reuse_access_token` option in Doorkeeper. This optimization helps handle cases where a large number of tokens exist.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Find matching tokens in batches for `reuse_access_token` option
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Token Introspection in Doorkeeper (Ruby)
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet related to configuring and implementing the Token Introspection feature in Doorkeeper, providing access to tokens and client information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Improve Token Introspection configuration option (access to tokens, client)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Access Token with Context in Doorkeeper (Ruby)
DESCRIPTION: Method to create an access token with proper context handling, used within refresh token requests to maintain consistent behavior when refreshing tokens.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
AccessToken#create_for
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring BCrypt Secret Storage in Doorkeeper Initializer
DESCRIPTION: Configuration code to restore BCrypt hashing behavior for application secrets in Doorkeeper. Used to maintain compatibility when upgrading from a version that used BCrypt.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
hash_application_secrets using: 'Doorkeeper::SecretStoring::BCrypt'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Default Generator Method for Doorkeeper Tokens
DESCRIPTION: Configuration option to change the token generation method from the default urlsafe_base64 to hex. Used when you have database constraints or custom validations that require the older hex format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
default_generator_method: :hex
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Renewing Application Secret in Doorkeeper (Ruby)
DESCRIPTION: Method for generating a new secret for a Doorkeeper application instance, allowing for secret rotation without creating a new application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Doorkeeper::Application#renew_secret
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Custom Authorization Error in Ruby
DESCRIPTION: Code example showing how to raise a custom authorization error message in the resource_owner_authenticator block
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: Ruby
CODE:
```
raise Doorkeeper::Errors::DoorkeeperError.new('custom_message')
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Doorkeeper Local Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up a local development environment for contributing to the Doorkeeper gem. This installs dependencies and starts a local server for testing and development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bundle install
bundle exec rake doorkeeper:server
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Application Scopes Migration in SQL
DESCRIPTION: SQL migration to add a scopes column to oauth_applications table for restricting allowable scopes
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: SQL
CODE:
```
add_column :oauth_applications, :scopes, :string, null: false, default: ''
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Previous Refresh Token Migration in Ruby
DESCRIPTION: Rails migration generator command to add previous_refresh_token column to oauth_access_tokens table
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: Ruby
CODE:
```
rails generate doorkeeper:previous_refresh_token
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Doorkeeper Tests with Rake in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This command runs the test suite for the Doorkeeper project using Rake, ensuring that all tests pass before and after making changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
rake spec
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests with Specific Rails Version
DESCRIPTION: Command for running the test suite with a specific Rails version by specifying an alternative Gemfile. This is used during development to ensure compatibility across Rails versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
BUNDLE_GEMFILE=gemfiles/rails_6_0.gemfile bundle exec rake
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Ruby Dependencies with Bundler in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the necessary Ruby dependencies for the Doorkeeper project using Bundler.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bundle install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning Doorkeeper Repository in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This command clones the Doorkeeper repository to the contributor's local machine after forking the project on GitHub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone git@github.com:your-username/doorkeeper.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Committing Version Changes in Doorkeeper
DESCRIPTION: Git command to commit version changes when releasing a new version of Doorkeeper. Updates both the version file and changelog with a standardized commit message.
SOURCE: https://github.com/doorkeeper-gem/doorkeeper/blob/main/RELEASING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git commit -am 'Bump to vVERSION'
```
